FlamingFist002.synopsis: Default dialogue for a Flaming Fist in the entrance hall of Wyrm's Rock in Wyrm's Crossing. Vignette character, one-liner.Vignette summary:"People are going back and forth on an hourly basis usually. We should still see traces of Flaming Fists coming and going, as well as show the omnipresence of the Steel Watchers and other security systems (inert traps from Gortash’s boss fight that activate only if you attack him at the ceremony would be great)."
FlamingFist002.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/BGO_Main_A- goto 4 44 220- Step forward into Wyrm's Rock fortress - speak to S_WYR_Fortress_FlamingFist002_baaf58e1-8880-4dda-a351-4d4680c3cb2f

FlamingFist001.synopsis: Default dialogue for a Flaming Fist in the entrance hall of Wyrm's Rock in Wyrm's Crossing. Vignette character, one-liner.Vignette summary:"People are going back and forth on an hourly basis usually. We should still see traces of Flaming Fists coming and going, as well as show the omnipresence of the Steel Watchers and other security systems (inert traps from Gortash’s boss fight that activate only if you attack him at the ceremony would be great)."
FlamingFist001.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/BGO_Main_A- goto 4 44 220- Step forward into Wyrm's Rock fortress - speak to S_WYR_Fortress_FlamingFist001_40893ed8-ef6c-437f-9ef3-3fa2c7ac3a98

AD_FlamingFist_SteelWatcherComment.synopsis: Vignette AD for the Flaming Fist in the entrance hall of Wyrm's Rock in Wyrm's Crossing.Vignette summary:"People are going back and forth on an hourly basis usually. We should still see traces of Flaming Fists coming and going, as well as show the omnipresence of the Steel Watchers and other security systems (inert traps from Gortash’s boss fight that activate only if you attack him at the ceremony would be great)."
AD_FlamingFist_SteelWatcherComment.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/BGO_Main_A- goto 8 43 223- Step forward into Wyrm's Rock fortress - approach the two flaming fists in front:S_WYR_Fortress_FlamingFist001_40893ed8-ef6c-437f-9ef3-3fa2c7ac3a98S_WYR_Fortress_FlamingFist002_baaf58e1-8880-4dda-a351-4d4680c3cb2f- If a brainquake happens, they will do the AD after it is finished

FlamingFist002_0.speaker: Fist Larys
FlamingFist002_0.context: NodeContext: Instruction, not to be argued with

FlamingFist002_1.speaker: Fist Larys
FlamingFist002_1.text: If you've something to report, take it elsewhere. I'm on watch.

FlamingFist001_0.speaker: Fist Serrik
FlamingFist001_0.text: Don't cause any trouble, all right? It's not worth it.
FlamingFist001_0.context: NodeContext: First half stronger, second half with half an eye on the steel watchers, worried what they'd do

FlamingFist001_1.speaker: Fist Serrik
FlamingFist001_1.text: Finish your business and be on your way.

AD_FlamingFist_SteelWatcherComment_3.speaker: Fist Serrik
AD_FlamingFist_SteelWatcherComment_3.text: Something's not right about those Steel Watchers, I'm telling you.

AD_FlamingFist_SteelWatcherComment_1.speaker: Fist Larys
AD_FlamingFist_SteelWatcherComment_1.text: Nah, they're harmless. Except if you're a criminal, of course.
AD_FlamingFist_SteelWatcherComment_1.context: NodeContext: Chuckling to themselves, thinks this is a great joke

AD_FlamingFist_SteelWatcherComment_2.speaker: Fist Serrik
AD_FlamingFist_SteelWatcherComment_2.text: It's more than that. The way they look at you, judging you... I don't like it.

AD_FlamingFist_SteelWatcherComment_0.speaker: Fist Larys
AD_FlamingFist_SteelWatcherComment_0.text: You're not being paid to like it. If I were you, I'd focus on my own job, and leave the Steel Watchers to theirs.
